patterns.message: ⛔ Use '@/shared/hooks' for utilities or '@/features/*/hooks' for feature hooks. See docs/reports/WEB_CUSTOMER_P3_5_GUARDRAILS.md
⛔ Use '@/shared/config' or '@/shared/utils' instead of '@/lib/constants' or '@/lib/utils'. See docs/reports/WEB_CUSTOMER_P3_5_GUARDRAILS.md
⛔ Zustand stores must not import from @/api. Use React Query in components instead. See docs/decisions/ZUSTAND_UI_STATE_ONLY.md
⛔ Zustand stores must not import from feature data layers. Use React Query in components instead. See docs/decisions/ZUSTAND_UI_STATE_ONLY.md
⛔ Zustand stores must not use React Query. Keep queries in components/hooks. See docs/decisions/ZUSTAND_UI_STATE_ONLY.md
